summary: A small mod that makes the standing stones more useful.
descriptionHtml:
Every feel like the Dragonborn All-maker stones were rather useless? well this is the mod for you.

All of the All-maker stones have been tweaked to make them better, more powerful, and actually worth the trek to solstheim every time you use one.

For a little added fun I changed all of the descriptions to be more grand, they are as follows:

[color=#ffff00][b]The Sun Stone 

[/b][/color]Fiery explosion erupts at the call of the blessed, any foolish enough to stand in it's way will know the wrath of the sun.

[b][color=#ffff00]The Beast Stone[/color][/b]

The Totem of the ancient nords comes at the call of the blessed, protecting them until the wilds call back it's mighty protector.
[b]
[color=#ffff00]The Earth Stone [/color][/b]

The blessed becomes one with the very bones of the earth, becoming an indomitable force of nature.
[b]
[color=#ffff00]The Water Stone [/color][/b]

The blessed may tap into the river of life and let it flow through them as the conduit of the All-maker.
[b]
[color=#ffff00]The Wind Stone [/color][/b]

At the cry of the blessed the sky itself splits apart, unleashing icy gales of destruction on all who defy the All-maker.
[b][color=#ffff00]
[/color][/b][b][color=#ffff00]The Tree Stone[/color][/b]

For his service to the all-maker the blessed is granted a portion of his creative power, the world itself bending to their will with ease.
author: LEGENDSOFMAGNUS7
